channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Some Common Commands in Shell(My First Blog)
item.description: Basic Commands ls(list) $ ls -l $ ls -F cp(copy) $ cp file1 file2 $ cp file1 ... fileN dir mv(move) $ mv file1 file2 $ mv file1 ... fileN dir touch $ touch filename rm $ rm filename echo $ echo Hello again. Hello again.
